name: The Fair Feathered 5
description:
After several long months, the intended version I hoped to release before is finally here!

   A 2D-rooty-shooty-platformy game about 5 (somewhat) average birds, forced out on a quest to save their favorite tavern's business by retrieving some stolen moonshine.

WHAT'S NEW?

BETTER MOVEMENT

   Compared to the previous version, the controls are pretty solid here. Move, jump, and shoot your way to the other side!

 CHARACTER SELECTION

   Now you can choose your own character! Each character has their own speed, jump height, and unique shooting mechanics that provide an interesting change to gameplay. Which bird of nuisance is your favorite?

MORE COLLECTIBLES

   Aside from the moonshine bottles (which now grant +1 to health), there are seeds that act like coins scattered across the level, including the Bonus Room's gold seed that's worth +10! Can you collect them all?

CUTSCENE!

   A dialogue/animation -based cutscene plays right after the Main Menu! Click on the red arrow to proceed through the dialogue and enjoy! If you don't like cutscenes, simply press the Esc key to skip it! But that would make me sad    :<

    An idea I'm working on for a comedic 2D platformer. Inspired by games like Super Mario, Rayman, and the Mega Man series. In early prototype stages.

   Any advice on character adjustments and/or bugs discovered are encouraged to be reported here. 

Your feedback is important!

   Extra information about controls, known bugs, & attributions provided in the README.
